document.full_text: japan has been offered german remote-controlled robots to help clean up and repair damage at its fukushima nuclear reactors, which are leaking radiation after being hit by an earthquake and tsunami.
document.title: germany offers japan robots for nuclear clean-up
lines_and_colors: japan has been offered german remote-controlled robots to help clean up and repair damage at its fukushima nuclear reactors, which are leaking radiation after being hit by an earthquake and tsunami.
